item.description: google said tuesday that the justice department is investigating its advertising practices and that google may have to pay $500 million, but did not disclose further details.

item.title: putin's party set for success in russian polls

item.description: crews on the mediterranean are being urged to watch for unseaworthy vessels carrying migrants from libya after a ship with 600 people broke up off the port of tripoli on friday.
